title: FS/FT: Ty Cobb T206 Red PSA 3

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Ty Cobb T206 Red PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Small right upper corner wrinkle.
Sale price is TRADED net to me with shipping included and trade value 5-10% higher. Looking for in return:
Mantle or mays 51 Bowman
Mays 52 Topps
Dark Cap Matty high grade
Ruth Goudey 33
Play ball Williams rookie
J. Robinson bowman 1949
Musial rookie
Other HOF rookies 
Surprise me

On something higher dollar, I can add more if needed with this Cobb as a starting piece.[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220122/a773f9c281f068eeb27b712eeae1bb0b.png[/IMG]
